item.title: Adidas introduces black clothing featuring heat management technology
item.description:
Source: adidas. Climachill apparel. Adidas recently debuted its new Climachill clothing line, featuring a black training t-shirt designed with technology that regulates body heat to keep wearers cool in hot weather. Ideal for warm and humid weather, Adidas Climachill maximizes cooling without sacrificing comfort or style. Dr. Maarten Hupperets, Director of Future Sport Science at Adidas, explains, “When we exercise, our body’s core temperature can rise by 3 degrees Celsius...
